ComicInfo.Summary: To have and to hold are two different things. Luther Washington has cornered his worst enemy, but Wizards have more lives than cats. Plus Luther has someone on his trail now. A creature more unstoppable than the terminator and a bevy of beauties from Section X. Make no mistake. Section X girls are easy on the eyes but they're hard on your ass!
